messages.message:
Hi team,
I'm getting issues while starting apps server. The logs are-
```ERROR:pika.adapters.base_connection:Connection to 127.0.0.1:5672 failed: [Errno 61] Connection refused
WARNING:pika.connection:Could not connect, 2 attempts left
ERROR:pika.adapters.base_connection:Connection to 127.0.0.1:5672 failed: [Errno 61] Connection refused
WARNING:pika.connection:Could not connect, 1 attempts left
ERROR:pika.adapters.base_connection:Connection to 127.0.0.1:5672 failed: [Errno 61] Connection refused
WARNING:pika.connection:Could not connect, 0 attempts left
ERROR:pika.adapters.blocking_connection:Connection open failed - 'Connection to 127.0.0.1:5672 failed: [Errno 61] Connection refused'
ERROR:root:Failed to connect to RabbitMQ queue relay.audit-logs: Connection to 127.0.0.1:5672 failed: [Errno 61] Connection refused
ERROR:root:Error initializing rabbitmq export endpoint: Connection to 127.0.0.1:5672 failed: [Errno 61] Connection refused
ERROR:pika.adapters.base_connection:Connection to 127.0.0.1:5672 failed: [Errno 61] Connection refused
WARNING:pika.connection:Could not connect, 2 attempts left
ERROR:pika.adapters.base_connection:Connection to 127.0.0.1:5672 failed: [Errno 61] Connection refused
WARNING:pika.connection:Could not connect, 1 attempts left```
It's just stuck here. Can anyone help?
can you check if rabbit mq is running?
Sometimes, it just stops here indefinitely.
how did you start the rabbitmq server ?
~yeah that will not work because it will not have auth setup~
can you start using docker `make build-docker run-docker`

Sure, Let me try it out.
Has something changed because I used to do it without docker all the time and didn't experience such an issue before this?
Non-docker one hasnt worked for me since months tbh :sweat_smile:
this is a related thread - they both should work but recommended way is to use docker
Thanks Sudeep, I'll take a look at the thread
yeah the tldr; is to try with docker :slightly_smiling_face:
@sudeep It's still not working. My apps-server just stops here.
I'm trying it out on May release branch.
